attributes.action: urge the Welsh Assembly Government to abandon its plans to force North Wales residents to travel to South Wales for routine neurology services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This proposal by WAG [Welsh Assembly Govenment] is top withdraw the facility of using Walton Nerology Hospital in Liverpool and forcing patients to travel much further to either Cardiff or Swansea.
The trauma of travelling is enormous for patients and relatives/friends.
We in North Wales are privileged to have such a facility at Walton and are keen to ensure its continued availability for North Walians

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "urge the Welsh Assembly Government to abandon its plans to force North Wales residents to travel to South Wales for routine neurology services."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
